entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
